rules module¶

class rules.Rules(settings: Settings)¶

Bases: object

A class to show the rules of the game

TEXT: str = 'The goal of the game is to get the highest score\npossible. You earn points by moving down tetrominos,\n1 point for soft drop and two points for hard drop.\nYou can also earn points by clearing lines.\n1 line is 100 points, 2 lines is 300 points,\n3 lines is 500 points, and 4 lines is 800 points.\nEach 10 lines cleared, the level increases.\nThe level increases the speed of the tetrominos.\nThe game ends when the tetrominos reach\nthe top of the screen.'¶
